## flattenChanges() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Flattens nested changes into a single array. Useful for reporting or counting total changes. Adds 'is-nested-change' tag to nested changes.

Note: This function does NOT mutate the input changes. Each nested change gets a new descriptor with the tag added.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function flattenChanges(changes: ApiChange[]): ApiChange[];
```
